Date: Monday, 6/16/1992
Subject: Eddie Murray injured
Hello Manager,
looks like he worked out a little to intense.
Diagnosis: Inflamed Groin Muscle.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take 3-4 weeks.

Regards,
Team Doctor
